name: Elvin's Quest
description:
CONTROLS: wasd for elvin and arrows for felix

You're Elvin. You need to protect you're friend Felix had gone through some dangerous adventures but got injured. Now you went to him but forgot how to escape the dungeon. Don't allow Felix to get away from the safe zone or he is dead. BE CARFUL BYE.  NOTE: Plz wait for some time for the html file to load

Procudural Walker: To win u need to reach a red box

Turret: No win just doge and play, u can click on the bullets to destroy them
